DOC.brief_summary: From April ,2014 April 2015,31 patient fracture proximal humerus treat hospital . According anatomic neck fracture ( ANF ) surgical neck fracture ( SNF ) , divide patient two group . All patient follow least 1 year .
DOC.brief_title: Outcome Proximal Humerus Fractures : Anatomic Neck Fractures v Surgical Neck Fractures
DOC.criteria: From May ,2013 April 2015 , patient fracture proximal humerus treat lock plate . Patients pathologic fracture , Patients previous surgery affect shoulder , Patients treat shoulder arthroplasty . Patients treat intramedullary nail .
